text: Cauco is a former municipality of the district of Moesa in the Swiss canton of Graubünden. On 1 January 2015, the former municipalities of Cauco, Arvigo, Braggio and Selma merged into the new municipality of Calanca. ==Villages== Cauco, Bodio, Lasciallo and Masciadone ==Other websites== * Official Website Category:Former municipalities of Graubünden
title: Cauco
